user.title: Anthropic API Key
user.description: To use Claude, you need an Anthropic API key. Get one at https://console.anthropic.com/settings/keys

data.api_key: API Key (leave empty to keep current)
data.prompt_description: Instructions for the AI on how it should respond to your requests. You can customize Claude's behavior and knowledge.
data.recommended_settings_description: When enabled, the recommended model (Claude 3.5 Sonnet) and optimal settings are used. Disable to customize model, tokens, and temperature.
data.control_ha: Allow Claude to Control Home Assistant
data.control_ha_description: When enabled, Claude can control your devices and provide information about your home. It can only access entities that you have exposed to it.
data.llm_hass_api_description: The Home Assistant API to use for device control. This allows Claude to interact with your devices.
data.chat_model_description: Select which Claude model to use. More powerful models (Opus) provide better responses but may be slower and more expensive.
data.max_tokens_description: The maximum number of tokens (words/characters) Claude can generate in a response. Higher values allow for longer, more detailed responses.
data.temperature_description: Controls the randomness of responses. Lower values (0.0-0.5) make responses more focused and deterministic. Higher values (0.5-1.0) make responses more creative and varied.
